DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the pharmacokinetic characteristics of DP-R206 (150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet, qd) and Vitamin D3 (24,000 IU Vitamin D3 , qd) after oral administration in healthy adult volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetic Characteristics of DP-R206(Vitamin D3) in Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The number of patient is thirty-six. Patients were randomly assigned either a Vitamin D3 tablet(24,000 IU Vitamin D3, qd) first, DP-R206(150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet, qd) Second or DP-R206(150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet, qd) first, Vitamin D3 tablet(24,000 IU Vitamin D3 , qd) second.
DOC.criteria: 20 to 55 years of healthy volunteers Hypersensitivity Reaction about Ibandronate or other drugs(aspirin, antibiotics)
